channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Coinbase Makes Preparations to Face Crypto’s Quantum Computing Threat
item.description: Fears of quantum computing breaking the back of blockchains are getting more realistic.

item.title: What's the Best Red Light Therapy Mask for Your Skin in 2026?
item.description: The LED devices we'd actually buy with our own money.

item.title: ‘Apple is going to have to do a lot to convince me I want this’ — new report suggests Apple will release an AI Pin in 2027
item.description: Apple may launch an AI Pin in 2027, but after Vision Pro and early wearable AI failures, it’s far from clear who actually wants one.

item.title: Engadget review recap: Valerion VisionMaster Max, Canon EOS R6 III and Samsung Bespoke Fridge
item.description:
Our reviews team is rested up after the CES grind and we’re back to business. This week we reviewed the latest devices from Valerion, Canon, Samsung and Sony, covering a wide range of product categories in the process. Grab yourself a beverage and cozy up with all the reviews you might’ve missed. Valerion VisionMaster Max
The weeks leading up to the Super Bowl are a popular time to upgrade home theater setups before the big game. One way to do that is Valerion’s VisionMaster Max — if you’re willing to splurge. “The Valerion VisionMaster Max is a highly capable indoor projector that offers t...

item.title: Pour sécuriser votre domicile, direction Amazon qui retire 20 % du prix de cette sonnette équipée d’un objectif 2K
item.description: Entre son objectif 2K à 160 degrés et son système de détection grâce à l'intelligence artificielle, la Tapo D205 est une superbe solution pour sécuriser votre domicile à petit prix puisqu'elle passe de 49,99 euros à 39,99 euros sur Amazon pour les soldes d'hiver 2026.

item.title: The Artemis 2 Astronauts Will Observe Parts of the Moon Humans Have Never Laid Eyes On
item.description: NASA’s Artemis 2 mission is no mere test flight. The crew will partake in some seriously mind-blowing science during their 10-day trip around the Moon.

item.title: The 52 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: The Rip, Frankenstein, and Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: 3 Best Cheap Gaming Laptops (2026): WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Most gaming laptops under $1,000 aren’t great, but these three machines stand out above the rest.

item.title: The 52 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Agatha Christie’s Seven Dials, Stranger Things, and His & Hers are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The OM System OM-3 just hit a new record-low price - is this stylish retro camera low-key an excellent value buy now?
item.description: The OM System OM-3 is just $1,699 now thanks to this deal from Adorama - a price that brings it right down into line with rival APS-C options.

item.title: More Cult of the Lamb, a World War II computer mystery and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. It’s been a very busy week of fun game releases (next week will be too!), so let’s get into some of them after a quick reflection on gaming while traveling.I love my Steam Deck. I really truly do. It’s a fantastic machine. And yet when I brought it with me on a five-week trip over the holidays, I used it for barely an hour the entire time. That doesn’t really justify the space and weight it takes up in my bag. The same holds true for my Nintendo Switch 2 and PlayStation Portal. I’ll be leaving them all at home next time....

item.title: Best Portable Blenders of 2026: Ninja, Nutribullet, Beast
item.description: Cordless portable blenders have come a long way since their introduction a decade back. Here's why the Ninja Blast Max smokes them all.

item.title: DOGE May Have Misused Social Security Data, DOJ Admits
item.description: Plus: The FAA blocks drones over DHS operations, Microsoft admits it hands over Bitlocker encryption keys to the cops, and more.

item.title: This is one of the best small-sized Bluetooth speakers I've tested, and it doesn't come from JBL or Bose
item.description: This budget-friendly Bluetooth speaker is compact and brilliant-sounding – here are 3 reasons why I'd buy it.

item.title: How to report crypto on your taxes
item.description: It may not be fiat currency, but Uncle Sam still expects you to report your cryptocurrency on your taxes. Here’s how to stay on the IRS’s good side. When crypto first gained prominence more than 15 years ago, one of the big selling points of the currency was its lack of ties to any specific government. Unlike fiat currency, cryptocurrency offered the possibility of a purely mathematical currency that was unrelated to politics, governance, or taxes....

item.title: Test du Geekom A7 Max : ne vous fiez pas à sa taille
item.description: Le Geekom A7 Max est un mini PC équipé d'un APU Ryzen 9 d'AMD. Vous n'avez rien compris ? Il est temps de lire ce test dans ce cas, vous allez comprendre ce qu'offre ce PC.

item.title: Test de la GoPro Max 2 : la plus robuste des caméras 360° est trop fragile face à la concurrence
item.description: Six ans après la Max originale, GoPro tente un retour dans l’arène des caméras 360 avec la Max 2. Face à l’Insta360 X5 et à la DJI Osmo 360 fraîchement débarquées en 2025, la marque californienne a-t-elle les arguments pour reconquérir un segment qu’elle avait fini par délaisser ?

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Apple’s AI Wearable and a Phone That Can Boot Android, Linux, and Windows
item.description: Plus: Asus exits the smartphone market, and Sony partners with TCL on TVs.

item.title: ‘The robot never gets tired’: Hyundai explains why its Boston Dynamics Atlas robot is ready to take over factories, but not your home
item.description: Hyundai and Boston Dynamics revealed plans to build 30,000 humanoid robots each year. Here's why they think its the future of manufacturing.

item.title: The Madison: release date, cast and everything we know about the new Yellowstone spinoff
item.description: The Yellowstone universe truly never ends, and new Taylor Sheridan spinoff The Madison is only a few weeks away — here's what you need to know.

item.title: How the Australian Open became a tech incubator
item.description: Tennis Australia has built a tech innovation machine that is changing how sports properties work with startups. Every year, Tennis Australia CEO Craig Tiley issues a challenge to his team that would make most executives—and their teams—break into a cold sweat: Reinvent 50% of the Australian Open. Not subtle changes or a few tweaks. Half of everything, so no two tournaments are ever the same....

item.title: Elon Musk fails to deliver on his Cybercab and Optimus promises—again
item.description: The Tesla CEO says production on the company’s robotaxis and humanoid robots will be ‘agonizingly slow’ in 2026. Tesla CEO Elon Musk just admitted what we have been saying since he first made his grand promises about the company’s Cybercab robotaxi and Optimus humanoid robot: His target to mass-produce these products was unrealistic, and now they’re crumbling faster than a Cybertruck’s accelerator pedal. ...

item.title: 106 housing markets are seeing falling home prices—and not a single one is in the Midwest
item.description: After a burst of softening, the count of major metros seeing year-over-year home price declines has stabilized over the past seven months. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.
